title: 1920’s Mansion Stay in Enchanting Myanmar
description: Tick enchanting Myanmar off your bucket list when you stay in the culturally-rich riverside city of Yangon, where ancient temples and glittering high-rises meet bustling bazaars. Stay at the colonial-style Belmond Governor’s Residence; a 1920’s mansion-turned-hotel rated the top hotel in Yangon and only ten minutes from the famous Shwedagon Pagoda. Includes daily buffet breakfast, two dinners, nightly cocktails and private return airport transfers.
offer_address: 35 Taw Win Road, Dagon Township, Yangon, Myanmar

title: Heritage Boutique Escape in Enchanting Myanmar
description: Tick enchanting Myanmar off your bucket list with a three-night stay in the culturally-rich riverside city of Yangon, where ancient temples meet glittering high-rises and bustling bazaars. Stay at the elegant Savoy Hotel Yangon; a heritage boutique hotel declared one of the top three hotels in the whole of Myanmar that sits in the shadow of the famous Shwedagon Pagoda. Includes a limousine airport pick-up, daily breakfasts, a three-course dining experience and more.

title: Modern Myanmar Stay with Onsite Dining, Bar, Pool & Spa
description:
Discover effortless elegance at this sophisticated address, ideally situated along the vibrant Kaba Aye Pagoda Road. Just 20 minutes from both Yangon International Airport and the dynamic city centre, this hotel places you within easy reach of iconic cultural landmarks, bustling business districts and premier shopping destinations like Myanmar Plaza.

After a day of exploration, unwind at MiCasa Restaurant & Bar, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool, or stay energised in a modern gym. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel's spa offers a range of rejuvenating treatments, perfect for adding a dose of calmness to your holiday.
offer_address: No 17 Kaba Aye Pagoda Road Yankin Township, Yangon 11081, Myanmar
